introduction: I'm a creative engineer focused on making exceptional digital products. Currently I'm focused on building my own start up at Dream Intelligence. But in this part of my journey I'm learning to read and write. So this's a place to host all my writings. I hope it inspires, motivates and helps you grow. Enjoy!

blogs.title: James Chapter 1
blogs.description: God is a loyal God. He is always faithful to his promises, even when we are not faithful to him. He loves us unconditionally and will never leave us or forsake us. We can always count on God to be there for us, no matter what.
